title: Usher - Here I Stand [2008] [CD+SkidVid_XviD+Cov] 320Kbps
description:
USHER - HERE I STAND, album to be released May 27th 2008.
Encoded 320Kbps [Lame] mp3. Covers included.

Usher Raymond IV [born October 14th 1978 in Chattanooga, Tennessee], known simply by his first name Usher, is an American R&B and pop singer and actor who rose to fame in the mid-late 1990s. To date, he has sold approximately 30 million albums worldwide and has won five Grammy Awards. Usher is also a part owner of the Cleveland Cavaliers National Basketball Association franchise. He also has his own record label, US Records.

Here I Stand is the 2008 album from the R&B superstar Usher. Here I Stand is Usher&#039;s follow-up to his history-making, nine-times platinum-selling Confessions. The album tells the story of growth: triumphant, reflective, somewhat defiant and it marks a new period in Usher&#039;s life and creative expression. Here I Stand finds Usher working with some of the best producers and writers around including Polow Da Don, Jermaine Dupre, Dre & Vidal and Dream & Tricky Stewart. Features the first single &#039;Love In This Club&#039;. Track 17 includes a hidden track &#039;Will Work For You&#039; which I have extracted for your listening convenience.
